Articles.Title: Are grades an accurate measure of an individual's intelligence?
Articles.Description: Grades are assigned to every student in the country, even in the world and this is just the standard we have come to expect. But are they right, do they even effectively serve their purpose?
Articles.Author: Nadir Ahmed-Ali

Articles.Title: A permanent cure for sickle cell?
Articles.Description: Many are still unaware as to what the sickle cell disease even is. Not to worry as this article will educate you on what it is, and the progression made in terms of the treatment for it.
Articles.Author: Shashank Iyer

Articles.Title: A Recap of Russian Conflict with Ukraine
Articles.Description: Russia's invasion of Ukraine is ongoing. This article will resultantly be incomplete, with a comprehensive recap of events only being possible after the fact.
Articles.Author: Kai Frater-Robertson
